Ingredients.5: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.6: 1 teaspoon chopped fresh chives, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Beat cream cheese, blue cheese dressing, 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese, and Buffalo wing sauce together in a bowl. Slightly mash cannellini beans in a separate bowl; fold into cheese mixture. Spread mixture into a pie pan or baking dish and top with remaining Cheddar cheese and chives.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, 20 to 25 minutes.
